trans-unit.source: AWS Access Key ID:Access key ID with appropriate permissions to execute Amazon Rekognition functions in the configured region.
AWS Access Secret Key:Access secret key.
AWS Region:The AWS region to access (e.g. "us-east-1").
Image Types:Comma-separated list of valid image types (e.g. jpg,jpeg,png).
Maximum File Size:Image files larger than this size will not be processed (maximum: 5MB, recommended: 2MB).
Detect Objects:Enable/disable function to recognize specific objects in images (default: enabled).
Detect Faces:Enable/disable function to recognize faces in images (default: disabled).
Recognize Celebrities:Enable/disable function to recognize celebreties in images (default: disabled).
